stopmodreposts.show_button: Show the button in the corner
stopmodreposts.close_notice: You will always be able to re-enable this button in the settings screen in ModMenu or in the config file. Note: now toasts won't appear either
stopmodreposts.toast: §6Where from did you get your mods?§f Click the button on the left for more
stopmodreposts.screen:
§6Have you downloaded all your mods from CurseForge, Modrinth, Diluv or GitHub? No?§r

Well, then you might have a problem, lots of other sites re-host mods, without any permissions. And some of them, also include malware into these files.
 
In order to be safe from such risks in the future, only download mods from big platforms, such as CurseForge or GitHub, or from transparent open-source platforms, such as Modrinth or Diluv. Make sure the author uploaded the mod themselves to the platform.

Press the button on the left if you wanna know more about this, and be safe in the future. We have tools for you to determine if a platform is trustworthy.
